trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Hastelot is in over his head.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_00<tab>Investigate the trail of scattered grain east of Wright.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_01<tab>Investigate the trail of scattered grain west of the Chisel.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_02<tab>Confront the former Eulmoran soldier and defeat the bandits.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_03<tab>Report to Hastelot.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_000<tab>I'm sorry, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>...? Please tell me you're a warrior of some kind...
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_001<tab>You see, there's a gang of bandits who've moved into the area. They used to be residents of Eulmore, but were exiled for stealing from free citizens.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_002<tab>Now they've taken to stealing from us instead. And anyone who tries to stand up to them gets a good beating for their trouble...
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_003<tab>Folk say they're former soldiers, and seeing how those bastards fight, I'm inclined to believe them.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_004<tab>We're just farmers here! We need someone who can stand up to them─someone who knows their way around a weapon! Could you be that person for us...?
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_005<tab>You'll teach them a lesson, then!? Oh, thank you!

TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_006<tab>We've already hatched a plan to track down their camp─poked a hole in a harvest sack and left it as bait. There's a trail of grain now, leading away from the village to the east, so you might want to start your search there.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_007<tab>Head out to the east and look for the trail of grain─it should lead you right to their camp.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>The trail of grain continues to the east...
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The trail of grain takes a sharp turn to the south...
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SOLDIER03357_000_030<tab>Bah, we've got us a sneaky rat, boys! Better grab it by the tail afore it squeaks to its mates!
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_040<tab>You...took care of them? I can hardly believe it!
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_041<tab>We work long and hard for the food we harvest, and to have it all snatched away by those brutes...

TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_042<tab>You'd think with all that training and discipline they'd have an easy time adjusting to an honest life in the field. But I suppose some men are cruel by nature.
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_043<tab>At least there are good people like you still around to renew my faith in the world. You have our thanks!
